name: mikroe.click.ccrf3
short_description: ccRF 3 click carries the CC1120 high-performance RF transceiver for narrowband systems from Texas Instruments. The clicks will enable you to add a low-power consumption radio transceiver at 433 MHz frequency. ccRF 3 click is designed to run on a 3.3V power supply. It communicates with the target microcontroller over SPI interface.
